[renodr] - Add a patch for xf86-video-ati that fixes various performance regressions and allows for the driver to build with a future version of xorg-server. This also allows users of ATI graphics cards on SysV systems to be able to run GNOME and KDE Plasma 5 again. Fixes #14129.
